item.title: Second
item.description: What is meant by critical thinking Every statement can be: Description Summary Opinion Belief Clarification Illustration Explanation Argument

item.title: Hello World
item.description: What is this course and the series of tutorials about? We are going to learn critical thinking, reading, and writing in this course, and critically appraising complex literature.
